display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Camera
• position: Vec3
• yaw: f32
• pitch: f32
Methods:
• forward()
• right()
• up()

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Grid
• bounds_min/max: Vec3
• num_levels: 4
• finest_cell_size: 16.0
• coarse_levels[0..3]:
- cell_size: f32
- grid_size: [usize; 3]
- counts: Vec<u8>
• fine_level:
- cells: Vec<Vec<u32>>
- max capacity: 8192/cell

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Box
• center0/center1: Vec3
• half_size: Vec3
• color: Vec3
• reflectivity: f32

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Triangle
• v0, v1, v2: Vec3
• uv0, uv1, uv2: Vec2
• material_id: u32

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Material
• base_color: [f32; 4]
• emissive: [f32; 3]
• texture_index: i32
• metallic: f32
• roughness: f32
• normal_texture_index: i32
• emissive_texture_index: i32
• alpha_mode: u32
• alpha_cutoff: f32

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
CameraUniform (96B)
• position: [f32; 3] + pad
• forward: [f32; 3] + pad
• right: [f32; 3] + pad
• up: [f32; 3] + pad
• time: f32
• lod_factor: f32
• min_pixel_size: f32
• show_grid: f32

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
GridMetadata (96B)
• bounds_min: vec3
• bounds_max: vec3
• num_levels: u32
• finest_cell_size: f32
• grid_sizes: array<vec4, 4>

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Coarse Grid Buffer
Flat u8 array:
level0_counts +
level1_counts +
level2_counts

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Fine Grid Buffer
Array of FineCellData:
struct FineCellData {
object_indices: array<u32, 8192>
count: u32
_pad: array<u32, 3>
}
Size: 32,784 bytes/cell!

span.p:
Texture Array
2D array with all
glTF textures

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
